title: Koh Samui Beachfront Luxury with Three Restaurants, Spa & Infinity Pool
description:
Overlooking a pristine beach on Koh Samuiâ€™s east coast, wake to the sound of the ocean and embrace tranquility at this five-star oasis on the white sands of Lamai Beach. With classic oriental architecture and feng shui design, The Lamai Samui is a calming and elegant escape backed by forested mountains. Spend your days at the infinity pool or indulge in a relaxing treatment at Le Spa before retreating to your spacious room or villa.

You'll find multiple dining spaces at your doorstep - try The Plate, The Ocean Pier and The Pool Bar, each serving up delicious bites paired with ocean or poolside views. With vehicle rental services available, you'll be able to travel to the furthest stretches of Koh Samui in luxury and ease.
